mapper.select: SELECT m.perms FROM admin_role r LEFT JOIN admin_user_role ur ON (r.id = ur.role_id) LEFT JOIN admin_user u ON (u.id = ur.user_id) LEFT JOIN admin_role_menu rm ON (rm.role_id = r.id) LEFT JOIN admin_menu m ON (m.id = rm.menu_id) WHERE u.username = #{username} AND m.perms is not null AND m.perms <> ''

SELECT m.* FROM admin_menu m WHERE m.type <> 1 AND m.id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT rm.menu_id FROM admin_role_menu rm LEFT JOIN admin_role r ON (rm.role_id = r.id) LEFT JOIN admin_user_role ur ON (ur.role_id = r.id) LEFT JOIN admin_user u ON (u.id = ur.user_id) WHERE u.username = #{username} ) ORDER BY m.order_num
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM admin_menu WHERE menu_id IN ( SELECT m.id FROM ( SELECT menu_id FROM admin_menu WHERE FIND_IN_SET( menu_id, findMenuChildren ( #{menuId} ) ) > 0 ) m )
